name: SmartAudio
0:
”Alexa open smart audio”
”Alexa ask smart audio to begin business news”
”Alexa launch smart audio”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: smart audio
des: Smart Audio delivers brief, well produced news bites on a variety of topics. Listen to the top 10 headlines in one minute or listen to stories in a specific news category. You can also listen to Associate Press's hourly news updates.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
